image.caption: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives

profileText: a Representative from Iowa; born in Dubuque, Dubuque County, Iowa, December 27, 1988; graduated from Hempstead High School, Dubuque, Iowa, 2007; U.S. Capitol Page School, 2006; B.A., Drake University, Des Moines, Iowa, 2011; legislative assistant; staff, Iowa state house; member of the Iowa state house, 2015-2019; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-January 3, 2021); unsuccessful candidate for reelection to the One Hundred Seventeenth Congress in 2020; unsuccessful candidate for nomination to the United States Senate in 2022; United States Special Envoy for Global Youth Issues, November 2022-present.
